synthesis_conditions.solvent_exchange: absolute ethanol for three times over three days
synthesis_conditions.drying_method: oven at 353 K for 1 day and vacuum drying at 423 K for 16 h

characterization.SEM: Philips XL-30 FEG with a tungsten filament

TGA.conditions: nitrogen flow at a heating rate of 276 K min−1 until 1173 K

XRD.equipment: STOE STADI MP diffractometer with a linear position sensitive detector (PSD)
XRD.conditions: 2θ = 3 to 90°, step width of 0.5°, internal PSD resolution 0.01°, and a step time of 400 s

gas_adsorption.conditions: heated for 7 h at 403 K and outgassed to 10-1 Pa

breakthrough_experiments.equipment: 15 cm-glass column with a 0.4 cm internal diameter
breakthrough_experiments.conditions: heated overnight at 423 K in a He flow (20 mL min−1)
